```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

## Import

```{r import}
data <- read_csv(
  "data-raw/Riverside_Covid_tests_zip.csv",
  col_types = cols(ZIPCODE = col_character())
  ) %>% 
  clean_names()

data %>% glimpse()
```

## Cleaning

```{r clean}
data_clean <- data %>% 
  mutate(
    lab_date = mdy(new_lab_date)
  ) %>% 
  rename(
    place = name
  ) %>% 
  select(lab_date, place, zipcode, lab_result) %>% 
  arrange(lab_date)

data_clean %>% glimpse()
```

## Export

```{r export}
data_clean %>% 
  write_rds("data-processed/riverside.rds")
```
